++ Juiblex

resides in the 222nd layer of the [Abyss]

is the parent of the [Mistwraith]'s employed by [Venril Sathir] to regulate individuals who became too strong.

The Faceless Lord often appeared to be a 9-foot-tall cone of slime striped with black, green, brown, yellow, and gray. At other times, he was nothing more than a pool of animated ooze. In all forms, Juiblex was covered in pulsating red eyes that could look in any and all directions.
